name: teleportArrival1
text: Edgard: Thanks...Uh, where is she?#lbNancy:Your grandmother will be here soon. But please,

name: teleportArrival2
text: Edgard: So this is the room where I'll be staying.#lbHard to believe it once belonged to dad.#lbWell, I'm going to check if grandmother needs something.

name: teleportNight1
text: Edgard: I guess it won't be a problem if I explore the house at night.

name: teleportKitchenFakeFadeOut
text: Edgard: That was delicious!#lbGrandma: I am glad you enjoyed, sweetie!.

name: teleportDay2
text: Edgard: I wonder if I should ask grandma and Nancy about what I heard last night.

name: teleportNight2
text: Edgard: Now that everyone's sleeping, I can explore the house a little bit.

name: teleportDay3
text: Edgard: What were those things in the house last night?#pbEdgard: Well, they seem to be gone by day. I better ask grandma or Nancy about it, but they probably won't believe me...
